formsErrors.UsernameNotValidError: Username can only have letters (A-Z, a-z) and numbers (0-9), max 12 characters
formsErrors.PasswordNotValidError: Password is not strong enough. It needs to have at least 8 alphanumeric characters
formsErrors.ServerError: An unexpected issue occurred, please try again later
formsErrors.UnexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred, please contact support
formsErrors.SystemError: A system error occurred, please contact support

ServerError.title: Server Error
ServerError.paragraph: There was an issue with the server. Please try again later.

UnexpectedError.title: Unexpected Error
UnexpectedError.paragraph: An unexpected error occurred. We are working on resolving it.

BadRequestError.title: Incorrect Data
BadRequestError.paragraph: The data you entered is incorrect. Please check and try again.
